name: futon-media
description: Instantly stream Movies and TV Shows via Emby Media

scripts.repo: git pull; echo; git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.restart: run-s stop; daemonize -c $PWD -e ~/.daemonize/futon-media.log -o ~/.daemonize/futon-media.log -a -p ~/.daemonize/futon-media.pid -l ~/.daemonize/futon-media.pid /usr/bin/env -i bash -l -c 'node dist/index.js'; tail -f -n 0 ~/.daemonize/futon-media.log
scripts.tshark:start: sudo daemonize -c $PWD -e ~/.daemonize/tshark.log -o ~/.daemonize/tshark.log -a -p ~/.daemonize/tshark.pid -l ~/.daemonize/tshark.pid -u root /usr/local/bin/websocat --exit-on-eof --text ws-l:127.0.0.1:8080 broadcast:sh-c:'tshark -i lo -Y http.request -T ek -J http -n -Q dst port 18096' && websocat ws://127.0.0.1:8080
scripts.watch:node: wait-for-change dist/index.js && sleep 0.1 && watchexec --restart --debounce 100 --watch dist --exts js -- NODE_ENV=development node --inspect dist/index.js
scripts.emby:restart: echo 'killall EmbyServer; sleep 1; open -a EmbyServer; tail -f -n 100 ~/.config/emby-server/logs/embyserver.txt | sedbat'
scripts.emby:del: echo ' command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/cache/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/activitylog.*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/collections/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/playlists/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/logs/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/movies/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/shows/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/library/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/livetv/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/transcoding-temp/*;'
scripts.emby:del:all: echo ' command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/cache/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/activitylog.*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/collections/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/displaypreferences.*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/library.*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/data/playlists/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/logs/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/movies/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/media/shows/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/library/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/metadata/livetv/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/root/default/*; command rm -rf ~/.config/emby-server/transcoding-temp/*;'

author: Robert Laverty <roblav96@gmail.com> (https://github.com/roblav96)
